title: The effectiveness of green heart application to manage modifiable risk factors of coronary artery disease in Tehran Heart Center: Study protocol for a randomized controlled trial
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Mojgan Ghavami, Saeed Sadeghian, Ayat Ahmadi, Masoumeh Lotfi-Tokaldany, Mahnaz Ashoorkhani, Fateme Haji Ali Asgari
